survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Electric Vehicle Charging Stations
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric vehicle (EV) charging stations to improve service quality, accessibility, and user experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public electric vehicle (EV) charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for mobile-friendly selection.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public electric vehicle (EV) charging stations?

questions.question_text: What type of EV charging station do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Ensure options are clearly distinguishable for non-technical users.

script.question_text: What type of EV charging station do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting an EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select; limit selections to 3 for data clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with max selection = 3

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting an EV charging station? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for standardized satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using public EV charging stations? (Open-ended)
questions.client_notes: Allow for detailed feedback; ensure mobile UI accommodates long-text input.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using public EV charging stations? (Open-ended)

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for reserved or guaranteed charging slots?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Daily' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Target frequent users to gauge monetization potential.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE); display only if Q1 answer is 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Daily'

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for reserved or guaranteed charging slots?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Daily' in Q1
